MushroomForest.Models

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • MushroomForest.Models.Model
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnitCube, UnitCylinder, UnitPlane

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates a 3D Model storing it's vertexes, faces, and normals.
    Author:
    Jedd Morgan
